00014 #ifndef _CTREENODEEDITOR_H_
00015 #define _CTREENODEEDITOR_H_
00016 
00017 #include <QObject>
00018 #include <QMenu>
00019 #include <QContextMenuEvent>
00020 
00021 class CTreeGraphModel;
00022 class QLineEdit;
00023 class QWidget;
00024 class CTreeNodeArtist;
00025 struct STreeNode;
00026 
00027 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00028 /// CTreeNodeEditor
00029 ///
00030 /// @description  This class is responsible for editing nodes.  It also handles
00031 ///               the context menu when right clicking on a node.
00032 ///
00033 /// @limitations  None
00034 ///
00035 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00036 class CTreeNodeEditor : public QObject
00037 {
00038     Q_OBJECT
00039 
00040 public:
00041     CTreeNodeEditor( QWidget *canvas );
00042     ~CTreeNodeEditor();
00043 
00044     bool canvasContextEvent( QContextMenuEvent *e );
00045     bool canvasMouseEvent( QMouseEvent *e );
00046 
00047     bool isAddingChildNode();
00048     bool isEditing();
00049 
00050     void paint();
00051     void setArtist( CTreeNodeArtist *artist );
00052     void setModel( CTreeGraphModel *model );
00053 
00054 public slots:
00055     void historyDone();
00056     void nameDone();
00057     void valueDone();
00058 
00059 private slots:
00060     void addChildClicked();
00061     void addParentClicked();
00062     void deleteNodeClicked();
00063     void editHistoryClicked();
00064     void editValueClicked();
00065     void renameNodeClicked();
00066     void setQuiescentClicked( bool on );
00067     void unhookClicked();
00068 
00069 private:
00070     void addChildDone( QPoint point );
00071     void setupActions();
00072     void setupMenus();
00073     void unhookDone( QPoint point );
00074 
00075     //This variable stores a pointer to the model for editing nodes.
00076     CTreeGraphModel  *m_model;
00077     //This variable stores a pointer to the canvas for drawing objects to it.
00078     QWidget          *m_canvas;
00079     //This variable stores a pointer to the line edit used for editing history.
00080     QLineEdit        *m_historyEdit;
00081     //This variable stores a pointer to the line edit used for editing names.
00082     QLineEdit        *m_nameEdit;
00083     //This variable stores a pointer to the line edit used for editing values.
00084     QLineEdit        *m_valueEdit;
00085 
00086     //This variable stores a pointer to the node artist.
00087     CTreeNodeArtist  *m_nodeArtist;
00088 
00089     //This variable stores a pointer to the node currently being edited.  It
00090     //should be NULL if no node is being edited.
00091     STreeNode        *m_selNode;
00092 
00093     //This boolean is used to indicate if a new child node is currently being
00094     //added.
00095     bool   m_isAddingChildNode;
00096     //This variable stores a pointer to the old parent node which the unhooked
00097     //node reverts to if the user tries to place on empty space.
00098     STreeNode *m_oldParent;
00099     //This variable stores the current position of the mouse used for painting.
00100     QPoint m_curPoint;
00101 
00102     //This variable stores a pointer to the context menu used when a node is
00103     //right clicked.
00104     QMenu *m_nodeMenu;
00105 
00106     //This QAction is used when a user wants to add a child node.
00107     QAction *m_nodeAddChildAction;
00108     //This QAction is used when a user wants to add a parent node.
00109     QAction *m_nodeAddParentAction;
00110     //This QAction is used when a user wants to delete a node.
00111     QAction *m_nodeDeleteAction;
00112     //This QAction is used when a user wants to edit the history value.
00113     QAction *m_nodeEditHistoryAction;
00114     //This QAction is used when a user wants to edit the value of a node.
00115     QAction *m_nodeEditValueAction;
00116     //This QAction is used when a user clicks on the Quiescent context menu
00117     //option.
00118     QAction *m_nodeQuiescentAction;
00119     //This QAction is used when a user wants to rename a node.
00120     QAction *m_nodeRenameAction;
00121     //This QAction is used when a user wants to unhook a node to move it to a
00122     //different parent node.
00123     QAction *m_nodeUnhookAction;
00124 };
00125 
00126 #endif /*_CTREENODEEDITOR_H_*/
